description: As a new addition to the fan-favorite Freedom line, the Men’s Freedom Insulated Jacket delivers 100% recycled waterproof coverage, all-conditions warmth and the on-mountain features you need for skiing, riding or touring. With a helmet-compatible hood, underarm venting and a snap-down powder skirt, you’ll be prepared every time you hit the slopes.
name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 80 g Heatseeker™ Eco 90% post-consumer recycled polyester in Body, 60 g in sleeves and hood
